summary: A simple retexture of the Noble Dress by Nimezis
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to retexture something that wasn't for personal use only and I came across this dress :)

This mod has a replacer version and a standalone* version.

 - The [b]replacer[/b] has three colour choices, but you can only use two. ((You can use the other colours from the standalone version if you rename the texture files yourself.)) Replacer v1.1 includes the "required" cubemap from CaBaL120's Ebony armor retexture mod, so you don't need to download it separately. However if you don't want to replace the cubemap at all for whatever reason, you can download the old version of the replacer version (the dresses may look different in this case though).
[b]IMPORTANT![/b]
For the replacer mod to work you WILL NEED to download the original mod by Nimezis first here; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54793/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54793/?[/url]
Please make sure to endorse the original mod to show support for it!

 - The [b]standalone*[/b] adds all the colour variations without replacing anything. All dresses are unenchanted and unarmored and can be found under the "Misc" section on the Blacksmith's Forge. This version also includes the cubemap from CaBaL120's Ebony armor retexture mod, however it does not replace the existing cubemap, so it will not mess with any other mod that uses the same cubemap.
[b]*IMPORTANT![/b]
Even the standalone version needs the meshes from the original mod ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54793/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54793/?[/url]), it will NOT work without them! [b]This is because I cannot upload the meshes from the original mod[/b], you don't need to use the original mod, but you will need to install [u]ATLEAST[/u] the following meshes;
[i]Data/meshes/NS/NobleDress/DR_gnd.nif
Data/meshes/NS/NobleDress/dress_0.nif
Data/meshes/NS/NobleDress/dress_1.nif

[/i]Again, please show support for the original mod by endorsing it!

Please feel free to add your own images as picture taking is not exactly my strong point... :P

Special thanks;
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/572584/?]Nimezis[/url] for giving me the permission to retexture this mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?]CaBaL120[/url] for giving me the permission to include his cubemap in this mod!
author: Messias Mummo
